name: LeGrind
description: Le Grind is  a game where you will have tasks to complete to stay alive. You have to stay active to maintain your health. You have inherited a disease that secretes poison into your bloodstream IF you are not active for a period.  You will be dropped into places like a gym or a park to complete obstacles. You have a stamina and health that will increase or decease depending how you complete task.  This will most likely be a wacky game. Stay active! Stay on LeGrind!
